publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2934 Mr Jim Wallace: The Draft Police Act 1997 (Enhanced Criminal Record Certificates) (Protection of Vulnerable Adults) (Scotland) Regulations 2002â€”That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Police Act 1997 (Enhanced Criminal Record Certificates) (Protection of Vulnerable Adults) (Scotland) Regulations 2002 be approved.
